      • getInstance

        public static GeolocationController getInstance()

      • setLocationSource

        public void setLocationSource(IGeolocationSource locationSource)
        Set location provider and activate it. All previously set location sources will be deactivated
        Parameters:
        locationSource -

      • setPriority

        public void setPriority(java.lang.Integer priority)
        Set geolocation priority. Works only if location source is set PlayServicesLocationSource. If any other custom location source is specified - this value is ignored.
        Parameters:
        priority - Such as com.google.android.gms.location.LocationRequest.PRIORITY_HIGH_ACCURACY. If null passed - default priority will be set.
